snippet: The pair of apartments could have been combined, but they worked even better as their own separate worlds.
abstract: Design-conscious couple Brian Crano and David Craig renovated two one-bedrooms in brownstone in Vinegar Hill, Brooklyn, which they kept as two individual apartments rather than combining.
lead_paragraph: The pair of apartments could have been combined, but they worked even better as their own separate worlds.

headline.main: Sunrise, Sunset and a Space for Each
headline.print_headline: Sunrise, Sunset and a Space for Each
